data.message: I spent hours uploading over 500 photos to an album and writing descriptions for all of them today. They were up a while, people commenting on them, and then all but 50 of the 500+ photos randomly disappeared. Huh? How does that even happen? Unacceptable.

replies.message: Hi Ryan. Please report this to us by following these steps listed in our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2fozwtk. Thanks! -Caitlin
Facebook I administrate a group from my iPad.  Something has changed in your formatting making me unable to access group files and group photos. Help, or put it back!  Thanks.
